TextBody:
Hi Joel,

Thank you for reaching out!

Netwrix Endpoint Protector and Netwrix Data Classification are separate products and they are not integrated.
Please let us know if there are any other questions regarding this subject.

Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com

Subject: RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #427126 - Data Classification config    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0IKIHl:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Joel,

Currently, there has not been introduced any integration with Netwrix Data Classification yet, it is in the future roadmap, but we can deal with metadata scanning for Office files and PDFs.

Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
